posts.post_title: Wts: T206 patsy dougherty portrait sgc 80  **SOLD**
posts.post_content: Beautiful card with fabulous centering. Clean back as well, beautiful purple color. First $225 gets it. Thanks
Have had a couple of emails pertaining the possibility of a better price. Would go to $200 delivered. Thanks
